prior3D 0.1.3

CRAN release: 2024-11-15

Minor changes

prior3D 0.1.2

CRAN release: 2024-11-06

Minor changes

  • Make internal code and outputs cleaner.

  • Add overall_available for 2D and 3D outputs from Compare_2D_3D and prioritize_3D.

  • Create CITATION file.

  • Update DESCRIPTION.

  • Update Introduction.Rmd and README text.

prior3D 0.1.1

Minor changes

  • Update README.md badges and text.

  • Update DESCRIPTION text.

  • Use rev(terrain.colors(255)) for plots.

  • Create pkgdown website.

prior3D 0.1.0
